test_cases.name: Suspicious Credential Harvesting
test_cases.content:
URGENT: Your account has been compromised!

We have detected unusual activity on your account. Please verify your identity immediately by clicking the link below:

https://paypal-security.tk/verify-account

Enter your username and password to secure your account.

This is a limited time offer - act now!

PayPal Security Team

Failure to respond within 24 hours may result in permanent account closure.

Amazon Customer Service
